org.lenskit.specs

Class AbstractSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.specs.AbstractSpec
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlgorithmSpec, CrossfoldSpec, DataSetSpec, DataSourceSpec, DynamicSpec, EvalTaskSpec, NDCGPredictMetric.Spec, PartitionMethodSpec, PrefDomainSpec, PRMetricSpec, TopNNDCGMetric.Spec, TrainTestExperimentSpec

    public abstract class AbstractSpec
extends Object

    Base class for specification beans. This class provides default implementations of equals(Object) and hashCode() for specifications.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Object o)

        Test this spec for equality with another spec. This implementation uses EqualsBuilder.reflectionEquals(Object, Object, boolean), with transient fields excluded.

        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Parameters:
        o - The object with which this spec should be compared.
        Returns:
        true if the specs are equal.
